property.value:
-- Declaring "Properties" from other controls on init as a standard practice -- This should make the code more organized
function init()
end
function onValueChanged(key)
if key == "page" then
local page = self.values.page + 1
self.children[page].children[1]:notify()
-- Notify Connection 1, Realearn, of Page changes
for i = 1, #self.children, 1 do -- Change this manually to number of pages if i == page then sendOSC('/Pager/'..tostring(page), 1, {true, false}) else sendOSC('/Pager/'..tostring(i), 0, {true, false}) end end
-- Action Refresh all surfaces sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})
end
end

function init() last = 0
lid2 = self.parent.children.mean lid = self.parent.children.peaks
sumSize = 300 sum = 0 index = 1
end
function onReceiveOSC()
-- Moves frame x
local now = getMillis()
sum = sum + self.values.x
index = index + 1
lid2.frame.x = (math.floor(self.values.x*19)) * 20
-- Just average, no rms because values are already decimal if (now - last > sumSize) then
lid.frame.x = (math.floor(sum/index*19)) * 20
last = now sum = 0 index = 1
end
end

function init() last = 0
lid = self.parent.children.lufs
sumSize = 300 sum = 0 index = 1
end
function onReceiveOSC()
-- Moves frame x
local now = getMillis()
print(self.values.x)
end

function onValueChanged(key)
if self.values.x == 1 and not self.values.touch then self.parent.children["feedback"].color = Color(80/255,80/255,80/255,1) self.parent.children["shadow"].frame.x = 10 self.parent.children["shadow"].frame.y = 10 self.parent.frame.y = self.parent.frame.y + 2
elseif not self.values.touch then self.parent.children["feedback"].color = Color(40/255,40/255,40/255,1) self.parent.children["shadow"].frame.x = 12 self.parent.children["shadow"].frame.y = 14 self.parent.frame.y = self.parent.frame.y - 2 end
end

function init()
_deviceFxFollowsAuto = root:findByName("deviceFxFollowsAuto", true) _trackBankFollowsAuto = root:findByName("trackBankFollowsAuto", true)
end
-- THE FOLLOWING MESSAGES WILL OVERRIDE REAPER's .osc FILE CONFIG
function onReceiveNotify()
if _trackBankFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/track/bank/follows', 'MIXER', { false, true }) end
if _deviceFxFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/fx/follows', 'DEVICE', { false, true }) end
sendOSC('/device/track/count', 8, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/send/count', 8, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/receive/count', 0, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/fx/count', 8, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/fxparam/count', 8, { false, true })
-- Notify Realearn, Connection 1 sendOSC('/realearn/track/count', 8/1000, {true, false})
end
-- Set this control name depending on its position function init() self.name = tostring(1 + (self.frame.x/self.frame.w)) end

function init() _faderCal = root:findByName("faderCalibrationZero", true) _fader = self.parent:findAllByType(ControlType.FADER, true)[2] end
function onValueChanged(key)
if key == "x" and self.values.x == 0 then _fader.values.x = _faderCal.values.x end
end
function onValueChanged(key) if self.values.x == 1 then self.color = Color(0.22, 0.5, 0.8) else self.color = Color(0.31, 0.31, 0.31) end end
function onValueChanged(key) if self.values.x == 1 then self.color = Color(1, 0.83, 0.35) else self.color = Color(0.31, 0.31, 0.31) end end
function onValueChanged(key) if self.values.x == 1 then self.parent.parent.children["colorKnobs"]:notify(self.parent.name) end end

function init() _colorCoder = self.parent.parent.children["colorCoding"] _autoColor = root:findByName("configColorCodingAuto", true) end
-- If the user wants to employ manual color coding instead of Realearn -- _autoColor is enabled by default, -- if its disabled, this will override Realearn's coloring
function onValueChanged(key)
if _autoColor.values.x == 0 then _colorCoder:notify(self.parent.name) end
-- To do: notify color change
end

if _autoColor.values.x == 0 then _colorCoder:notify(self.parent.name) end
end

function init() _colors = root:findByName("configColorCoding", true)
end
function onReceiveNotify(key)
local track = self.parent.children[key] local trackName = track.children["name"].values.text
for i = 1, #_colors.children, 1 do label = _colors.children[i]
if string.find(trackName, label.values.text) then track.children["select"].color = label.color return end
end
end

function onReceiveNotify(key)
local group = self.parent.children[key] local color = group.children["select"].color local trackKnobs = self.parent.children["trackKnobs"]
for i = 1, #trackKnobs.children, 1 do trackKnobs.children[i].color = color for j = 1, #trackKnobs.children[i].children, 1 do trackKnobs.children[i].children[j].color = color end end
end

function init() cluster = self.parent.parent
nameVolume = self.name nameString = self.name.."/str"
geoff = root:findByName("geoff", false)
end
function onReceiveNotify(key, values)
if key == "Tap" then
elseif key == "DoubleTap" then
elseif key == "Hold" then
for i = 1, 8, 1 do cluster.children[i].children[2].name = nameVolume cluster.children[i].children[4].name = nameString
geoff:notify("Faders control "..nameVolume, 0.7)
end
-- Action Refresh all surfaces sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})
end
end

end

_fader.values.x = _faderCal.values.x --sendOSC("/track/volume", _faderCal.values.x, {false, true})
end
end

-- Stores positions so its easier to use
local fxBank = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0} local prev = 0
function onValueChanged(key) if key == "x" then local x = self.values.x local bank = self.parent.children["device/fxparam/bank/select"] local y = bank.values.x
fxBank[prev + 1] = y bank.values.x = fxBank[x + 1] prev = x end end

function onValueChanged(key) local knob = nil local unit = nil local knobs = 8
local c = (self.values.x + 1)/(self.steps) local color = Color(c, 1 - (1 - 2*c)^2, 1 - c) -- color rgb formula for gradient is 1-x, 1 - (1-2x)^2, x
if key == "x" then for i = 1, knobs, 1 do knob = self.parent.children[tostring(i)].children["value"] knob.color = color
end end end

for i = 1, #_colors.children, 1 do label = _colors.children[i]

function init()
_deviceFxFollowsAuto = root:findByName("deviceFxFollowsAuto", true) _trackBankFollowsAuto = root:findByName("trackBankFollowsAuto", true)
end
-- THE FOLLOWING MESSAGES WILL OVERRIDE REAPER's .osc FILE CONFIG
function onReceiveNotify()
if _trackBankFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/track/bank/follows', 'MIXER', { false, true }) end
if _deviceFxFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/fx/follows', 'DEVICE', { false, true }) end
sendOSC('/device/track/count', 4, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/send/count', 1, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/receive/count', 8, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/fx/count', 16, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/fxparam/count', 20, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/marker/count', 0, { false, true }) sendOSC('/device/region/count', 0, { false, true })
-- Notify Realearn, Connection 1 sendOSC('/realearn/track/count', 4/100, {true, false})
end

-- Realearn handles the rest function onReceiveNotify(key, value) sendOSC("/desk/select/track/"..self.parent.parent.name.."/fx", (tonumber(key) - 1)/1000, {true, false})
end

-- Use specific action designed for this template -- Actions are part of the reaper_betoOSC.dll/.dylib extension function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
local actionName = "_Beto_SelTracks_FX_OnOff_"..key
sendOSC("/action/str", actionName, {false, true})
--sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})
end

-- Use specific action designed for this template -- Actions are part of the reaper_betoOSC.dll/.dylib extension function onReceiveNotify(key, pointers)
--sendOSC("/device/track/select/"..self.parent.name, 1, {false, true})
-- Calculate target index
local w0 = self.parent.frame.w local h0 = self.parent.frame.h
local w1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.w local x1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.x
local h1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.h local y1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.y
local x2 = math.floor((x1 + pointers.x)/w1) * w1 local y2 = math.floor((y1 + pointers.y)/h1) * h1
if x2 < 0 then x2 = 0 elseif x2 > w0 - w1 then x2 = w0 - w1 end if y2 < 0 then y2 = 0 elseif y2 > h0 - h1 then y2 = h0 - h1 end
--local column = (x2 / w1) --local row = 1 + (y2 / h1) --local index = row + ( column * w0 / w1 ) local column = 1 + (x2 / w1) local row = (y2 / h1)
local index = column + ( row * h0 / h1 )
-- Send OSC
local actionName = "_Beto_SelTrack0_FX_Move_"..key.."_"..tostring(index)
sendOSC("/action/str", actionName, {false, true})
sendOSC("/desk/select/track/"..self.parent.name.."/fx", (tonumber(index) - 1)/1000, {true, false}) --sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})

local multi = "Tap" local past = 0 local doubleTapTime = 200 local holdTime = 1000
function onValueChanged(key)
-- On Press. if key == "touch" and self.values.touch == true then
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past < doubleTapTime) then multi = "DoubleTap" else multi = "Tap" end
past = getMillis()
-- On Release. elseif key == "touch" and self.values.touch == false then
self.parent:notify(multi, self.pointers)
past = getMillis()
end
end
function onPointer()
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past > holdTime) then multi = "Hold" self.values.x = 0 end end

function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
fader.values.x = fader.values.x + value*0.001
end

-- Realearn handles the rest local fader = self.parent.children.fader
function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
fader.values.x = fader.values.x + (value*0.009)
end

-- Realearn handles the rest local fader = self.parent.children.fader
function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
fader.values.x = fader.values.x + (value*0.05)
end

self.parent.children[key]:notify(self.name,-1)
end

end

if key == "x" then
self.parent.children[1].frame.y = 50 - (self.values.x*120)
end

end

-- Use specific action designed for this template -- Actions are part of the reaper_betoOSC.dll/.dylib extension function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
local actionName = "_Beto_SelTracks_FX_OnOff_"..key
sendOSC("/action/str", actionName, {false, true})
--sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})
end

-- Use specific action designed for this template -- Actions are part of the reaper_betoOSC.dll/.dylib extension function onReceiveNotify(key, pointers)
--sendOSC("/device/track/select/"..self.parent.name, 1, {false, true})
-- Calculate target index
local w0 = self.parent.frame.w local h0 = self.parent.frame.h
local w1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.w local x1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.x
local h1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.h local y1 = self.parent.children[key].frame.y
local x2 = math.floor((x1 + pointers.x)/w1) * w1 local y2 = math.floor((y1 + pointers.y)/h1) * h1
if x2 < 0 then x2 = 0 elseif x2 > w0 - w1 then x2 = w0 - w1 end if y2 < 0 then y2 = 0 elseif y2 > h0 - h1 then y2 = h0 - h1 end
--local column = (x2 / w1) --local row = 1 + (y2 / h1) --local index = row + ( column * w0 / w1 ) local column = 1 + (x2 / w1) local row = (y2 / h1)
local index = column + ( row * h0 / h1 )
-- Send OSC
local actionName = "_Beto_SelTrack0_FX_Move_"..key.."_"..tostring(index)
sendOSC("/action/str", actionName, {false, true})
sendOSC("/desk/select/track/"..self.parent.name.."/fx", (tonumber(index) - 1)/1000, {true, false}) --sendOSC("/action/str", "41743", {false, true})
end

-- Rename itself depending on its x,y position function init()
local column = 1 + (self.frame.x/self.frame.w) local row = 1 + (self.frame.y/self.frame.h) local maxRows = self.parent.frame.h/self.frame.h
self.name = column + ((row-1) * maxRows)
end
-- Notify Multigesture Function function onReceiveNotify(key, pointers)
self.parent.children[key]:notify(self.name, pointers[1])
end

-- This is a Multi-gesture button. -- It notifies parent on Release.
function init()
holdTime = 1000 doubleTapTime = 300
past = 0
-- Tap, DoubleTap, Hold, DoubleHold? multi = "Tap"
-- Ghost is a Control that will serve as reference of pointer position ghost = self.parent.parent.children["ghost"]
yCentered = self.parent.frame.y - self.parent.frame.h/2 xCentered = self.parent.frame.x - self.parent.frame.w/2
end
function onValueChanged(key)
-- On Press. if key == "touch" and self.values.touch == true then
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past < doubleTapTime) then multi = "DoubleTap" else multi = "Tap" end
past = getMillis()
ghost.visible = false
-- On Release. elseif key == "touch" and self.values.touch == false then
self.parent:notify(multi, self.pointers)
past = getMillis()
ghost.frame.y = -ghost.frame.h ghost.visible = true
end
end
function onPointer()
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past > holdTime) then
multi = "Hold" ghost.visible = true ghost.frame.y = yCentered + self.pointers[1].y ghost.frame.x = xCentered + self.pointers[1].x
end
end

local column = 1 + (self.frame.x/self.frame.w) local row = 1 + (self.frame.y/self.frame.h) local maxRows = self.parent.frame.h/self.frame.h
self.name = column + ((row-1) * maxRows)
end
-- Notify Multigesture Function function onReceiveNotify(key, pointers)
self.parent.children[key]:notify(self.name, pointers[1])
end

yCentered = self.parent.frame.y - self.parent.frame.h/2 xCentered = self.parent.frame.x - self.parent.frame.w/2
end
function onValueChanged(key)
-- On Press. if key == "touch" and self.values.touch == true then
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past < doubleTapTime) then multi = "DoubleTap" else multi = "Tap" end
past = getMillis()
ghost.visible = false
-- On Release. elseif key == "touch" and self.values.touch == false then
self.parent:notify(multi, self.pointers)
past = getMillis()
ghost.frame.y = -ghost.frame.h ghost.visible = true
end
end
function onPointer()
local now = getMillis()
if(now - past > holdTime) then
multi = "Hold" ghost.visible = true ghost.frame.y = yCentered + self.pointers[1].y ghost.frame.x = xCentered + self.pointers[1].x
end
end

-- Rename itself depending on its x,y position function init()
local column = 1 + (self.frame.x/self.frame.w) local row = 1 + (self.frame.y/self.frame.h) local maxRows = self.parent.frame.h/self.frame.h
self.name = column + ((row-1) * maxRows)
end
-- Notify Multigesture Function function onReceiveNotify(key, pointers)
self.parent.children[key]:notify(self.name, pointers[1])
end

function onValueChanged(key)
if key == "x" then
sendOSC("/desk/select/track/"..self.parent.name, (self.values.x)/1000, {true})
end
end

function onValueChanged(key)
if key == "x" then
self.parent.children[1].frame.y = 50 - (self.values.x*120)
end
end

function init()
_deviceFxFollowsAuto = root:findByName("deviceFxFollowsAuto", true) _trackBankFollowsAuto = root:findByName("trackBankFollowsAuto", true)
end
-- THE FOLLOWING MESSAGES WILL OVERRIDE REAPER's .osc FILE CONFIG
function onReceiveNotify()
if _trackBankFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/track/bank/follows', 'DEVICE', { false, true }) end
if _deviceFxFollowsAuto.values.x == 1 then sendOSC('/device/fx/follows', 'FOCUSED', { false, true }) end
end

function onValueChanged(key)
local fxName = self.values.text
if fxName == "Pro-Q 3 (FabFilter)" then local proQ3 = self.parent.children["Pro-Q 3"] proQ3:notify() else sendOSC({"/device/fxparam/count", { {tag = 'i', value = '8'} }}, { false, true, false, false, false }) end
end

function onReceiveNotify() self.frame.x = 0 self.frame.y = 50
sendOSC({"/device/fxparam/count", { {tag = 'i', value = '26'} }}, { false, true, false, false, false })
self.children["radioA"]:notify() end

function onValueChanged() onReceiveNotify() end
function onReceiveNotify()
-- back to formula local c, m, x = self.values.x / self.steps, 0.7, 0.3 local r = x + m*(1 - c) local g = x + m*(1 - (1 - 2*c)^2) local b = x + m*c
self.parent.children["bandA"]:notify("rgb", {r, g, b}) self.parent.children["bandB"]:notify("rgb", {g, b, r}) self.color = Color(r,g,b) end

local delay = 250 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) or (not self.values.x) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then self.values.y = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local delay = 200 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then --do something cool with double tap --self.parent.children["value"].values.x = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local delay = 200 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then --do something cool with double tap --self.parent.children["value"].values.x = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local delay = 200 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then --do something cool with double tap --self.parent.children["value"].values.x = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

function onReceiveNotify(key, values)
local r,g,b = values[1], values[2], values[3] local color = Color(r, g, b)
local children = self.children
for i = 1, #children, 1 do for j = 1, #children[i].children, 1 do children[i].children[j].color = color end end end

local delay = 200 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then --do something cool with double tap --self.parent.children["value"].values.x = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local delay = 200 local last = 0
function onValueChanged() if(not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then --do something cool with double tap --self.parent.children["value"].values.x = 0.5 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local w = self.children.white.children local b = self.children.black.children
local keys = { w[1], b[1], w[2], b[2], w[3], w[4], b[3], w[5], b[4], w[6], b[5], w[7], w[8], b[6], w[9], b[7], w[10], w[11], b[8], w[12], b[9], w[13], b[10], w[14] }
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if(key == 'octave') then local octave = value local index = octave * 12 for i=1,#keys do local note = index + (i-1) keys[i].name = note keys[i].visible = (note <= 127) end self.children.C0.values.text = 'C' .. (octave -1) self.children.C1.values.text = 'C' .. (octave) end end
onReceiveNotify('octave', 4)
function onValueChanged(key) if(not self.values.touch) then self.parent.children.octave:notify('down') end end

local octave = 4
function updateDisplay() self.values.text = octave - 1 end
function onReceiveNotify(key) if(key == 'down') then octave = octave - 1 if(octave < 0) then octave = 0 end elseif(key == 'up') then octave = octave + 1 if(octave > 9) then octave = 9 end end
updateDisplay() self.parent.children.keys:notify('octave', octave)
end
updateDisplay()
function onValueChanged(key) if(not self.values.touch) then self.parent.children.octave:notify('up') end end

function init() _db = self.parent.children["faderCalStringDB"] _fader = self.parent.children["faderCalibrationZero"] _auto = self.parent.children["faderCalAuto"]
end
function onValueChanged()
if _auto.values.x == 1 and _db.values.text == "0" then _fader.values.x = tonumber(self.values.text) end
end

value.default: Waiting on Realearn update on Track follows Mixer view

property.value:
function init() _fader = self.parent.children["faderCalibrationZero"]
end
function onValueChanged(key)
if self.values.x == 1 then _fader.interactive = false else _fader.interactive = true end
end

-- Hello I'm Geoff. I will deliver the messages you want. -- Just notify me with (message, duration in seconds) -- And the message will appear in the middle of the screen -- It has a fade in and fade out of sin(x)
function init()
cycle = 500 last = 0 self.visible = false
end
-- Send the message and the duration in seconds function onReceiveNotify(key, value)
self.frame.y = 320
self.values.text = key self.visible = true
cycle = 1000*value/2
last = getMillis()
end
function update()
local now = getMillis()
y = math.sin((now - last)/cycle) self.textColor.a = y self.color.a = y
if y < 0 then self.visible = false end
end
